item.title: Social Media Marketing and SEO Campaign - Upwork
item.description:
Social Media Marketing and Management:
Platforms: Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and TikTok.
Marketing campaigns on Facebook and Instagram will be created and managed by me. However, the ad expenses will be covered by you, with an estimated daily cost of $5-$10.

Donation Campaign:
To collect donations, we need your account details. The donation campaign will run on Facebook and Instagram.

Website SEO:

We will integrate keywords and content as discussed. I will update your current Wix website to include keywords, content, slugs, URLs, meta titles, descriptions, alt-texts, and image optimization. This service will cost $350 as a one-time fee.

Content Creation:

Weekly, you will share news and topics for our content writer to develop. The content will be approved by you before publishing.

SEO Reporting:

I will provide a monthly SEO report and backlink sheets.

Social Media Management Reporting:

You can choose between monthly or weekly reporting for social media management. Based on your preference, I will share the content calendar and post designs with you. Reels and short videos will be provided by you.

Pricing:

Hourly Rate:
$35 per hour, which includes post design and video editing.
If video editing and post design are not required, the hourly rate is $25.

Monthly Rate:
$1250 per month, which includes all services mentioned. This is a one-time discounted rate.
Please review these details and share your thoughts. I will provide daily updates on all tasks, including content, posts, and video editing.

WiX Website support

Budget: $1,600
Posted On: June 24, 2024 21:49 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Facebook Advertising, Social Media Marketing, Facebook, Internet Marketing, Instagram, Search Engine Optimization, Marketing Strategy, SEO Keyword Research, Google Analytics, Google Ads
Skills: Facebook Advertising, Social Media Marketing, Facebook, Internet Marketing, Instagram, Search Engine Optimization, Marketing Strategy, SEO Keyword Research, Google Analytics, Google Ads
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Create video ads for Meta - Upwork
item.description:
Bookroo needs someone that can take our UGC and turn it into compelling Meta ads.

Our current video ads are underperforming
- Hook Rates ~18-20% (goal 30-40%)
- Hold Rates ~3% (goal 10%)
- CTR ~0.8% (goal 2-3%)

Our primary target market is moms ages 24-35 with young children, or grandma's with young grandkids.

We're looking for someone that can step in and create compelling videos that will perform well on Meta. Bookroo has a beautiful, visually appealing product. It also solves an important problem for parents—providing their children with a steady stream of age-appropriate, expert curated books.

- https://bookroo.com

- https://www.facebook.com/ads/library/?active_status=all&ad_type=all&country=ALL&view_all_page_id=389507974544386&search_type=page&media_type=all



Hourly Range: $25.00-$60.00
Posted On: June 24, 2024 21:41 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Video Commercial
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Video Commercial
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
